issue.title: [Doc][Guide] Finding JIRA issues - minor corrections
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15345](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15345). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
#### **step_by_step/finding_issues.rst - Finding JIRA issues**
 \* Correct the last link → “Lifecycle of a pull request” should point to the “Working on the Arrow codebase” section which is the next section.
 \* And add a reference to the “Lifecycle of a pull request” before that to point the user to the instructions for creating a new branch.

comments.body:
